We can't wait to see you all for our Christmas Celebration! We've got an action-packed day ahead. There are a LOT of details we need to share with you, so please read carefully -- but of course the most important thing is for us to be together!

- 4:00 - 6:00 Bowling at <a href="https://goo.gl/maps/q7JSkrzdrsT2" target="_blank">Bowlero Lakeville</a>

# Detailed Schedule

## Scandiavian Desserts Workshop @ 10:30

Grandma Diane will lead a Desserts Workshop in the Legends Great Room. Learn about our Scandianvian Van Grinsven heritage! We'll also learn to make Krumkake and Rosettes. Yum!

## Mall Madness @ 1:30

This year, we're playing Mall Madness! After we arrive at the mall, everyone will fill out a short questionnaire about their sizes, interests, and Christmas wishes. Then we'll fold up all the questionnaires and put them in a hat and mix them up! Each person then draws a questionnaire **at random** -- You have to find the **perfect gift** for \$20 or less SOMEWHERE IN THE MALL OF AMERICA! Grandma Diane will be handing out crisp \$20 bills to each participant. 

Important: You'll need to bring supplies to wrap your gift **before** you get back to Grandmas! Gift bags are probably easiest...

- We'll meet on the **3rd level south food court** on the balcony overlooking the Lego Store at the Mall of America. 
- A nearby landmark is <a href="https://www.mallofamerica.com/directory/burger-burger" target="_blank">Burger Burger</a>. 
- Here's a video of the location!

## Italian Christmas Dinner

- Come to Grandma's House right after bowling
- Hors d'oeuvres from 6:00 - 7:00
- Grand Family Staircase Photo to be taken **promptly** at 7:15
- The dress code for the Italian Christmas Dinner is "moderately fancy"
- The Mall Madness Gift Exchange will take place after dinner!
- We'll have food, dinner, and drinks all ready for everyone. We're avoiding any non-clear beverages so that any spills are easy to clean up!
